item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The Netherlands has returned some stolen artifacts to Indonesia (85 points | 47 comments)
2. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (October 2024) (43 points | 47 comments)
3. ESO telescope captures the most detailed infrared map of the Milky Way (170 points | 36 comments)
4. Should you use Rust in LLM based tools for performance? (29 points | 11 comments)
5. Show HN: A real time AI video agent with under 1 second of latency (8 points | 2 comments)
6. Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (October 2024) (25 points | 53 comments)
7. Antidemocratic, Racist, and Antisemitic Sentiments in Postwar West Germany (6 points | discuss)
8. Boris Vallejo and the pixel art of the demoscene (416 points | 100 comments)
9. Comedy Theory (2022) (179 points | 123 comments)
10. The Liberating Experience of Common Lisp (62 points | 38 comments)
11. Mozilla's lapse in judgement causes clash with uBlock Origin developer (147 points | 91 comments)
12. Bop Spotter (2229 points | 363 comments)
13. NewsCatcher News API (YC S22) Is Hiring ( | hide)
14. Pro bettors have taken to disguising themselves as gambling addicts (92 points | 62 comments)
15. Ask HN: Should you reply STOP to unwanted texts? (194 points | 259 comments)
16. Better privacy can be one click away. Google and Apple won't allow it (7 points | 2 comments)
17. Show HN: qrframe – generate beautiful qr codes with javascript code (342 points | 48 comments)
18. Essential node in global semiconductor supply chain hit by Hurricane Helene (189 points | 49 comments)
19. What the photographer who’s taken philosopher portraits thinks of philosophers (35 points | 10 comments)
20. Sea robins use leg-like fins to taste, navigate seafloor, researchers discover (35 points | 4 comments)
21. Bots, so many bots (131 points | 129 comments)
22. Hasbro's Trademark for the Smell of Play-Doh (3 points | 1 comment)
23. Evolving GitHub Issues (73 points | 49 comments)
24. PyTorch Native Architecture Optimization: Torchao (148 points | 45 comments)
25. Show HN: Facad – A colorful directory listing tool for the command line (133 points | 84 comments)
26. Do All Problems Have Technical Fixes? (67 points | 67 comments)
27. Vanishing Culture: Preserving Cookbooks (131 points | 86 comments)
28. Matrix-Libera IRC Bridge Temporary Shutdown, a Retrospective (2023) (71 points | 44 comments)
29. The Case of the Missing Increment (59 points | 19 comments)
30. Show HN: Venator – Open-source threat detection (70 points | 3 comments)
